heroSubtitle: Dive into my universe of development, design, and digital experiments
aboutContent:
Welcome to my digital space! I'm a passionate developer who thrives on turning complex problems into elegant solutions. My journey in technology began with curiosity and has evolved into a deep love for creating meaningful digital experiences.

From building responsive web applications to experimenting with AI and machine learning, I'm constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Each project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and contribute to the ever-evolving landscape of technology.
projectsSubtitle: Showcasing innovative solutions and creative experiments
projectsDescription: Explore my portfolio of projects spanning AI/ML, web development, and experimental technologies. Each project represents a unique challenge and learning opportunity.
labSubtitle: Experimental Zone ‚Ä¢ Interactive Demos ‚Ä¢ Creative Coding
labDescription: Welcome to my digital laboratory! This is where I experiment with new technologies, test creative ideas, and build interactive demos.
contactSubtitle: Ready to collaborate, discuss ideas, or just say hello? I'd love to hear from you!
logsDescription: Track my development journey, learning milestones, and project progress through detailed logs and reflections.
adminDescription: Administrative interface for managing site content, vault documents, and system settings.

highlights.title: GfG Campus Body - GITAM , Jhajjar
highlights.description: The GeeksforGeeks Campus Body at GITAM, Jhajjar is a student-led initiative established under the official GFG Campus Program. As the Campus Mantri, I aim to build a thriving coding culture in our college by organizing workshops, contests, and community events. This chapter acts as a bridge between students and real-world tech exposure, empowering peers to grow through consistent learning, collaboration, and innovation.
